fun.connor.lighter.compiler.generator.endpoint

Class ResolveMethodGenerator

  • java.lang.Object
    • fun.connor.lighter.compiler.generator.endpoint.ResolveMethodGenerator

  • public class ResolveMethodGenerator
extends java.lang.Object
    Java source code generator for the LighterRequestResolver.resolve(Map, Map, Request) method in LighterRequestResolver implementations. This class is quite complex as the resolve method is responsible for marshalling the raw request into the Java type dependencies of the endpoint method it delegates to. This includes data from the path parameters, query parameters, request body, and RequestGuardFactories.

    This complexity is not exposed by the interface, however. The behavior of the request method is fixed for every resolver, so there is no need to expose complex configuration of behavior.

      • ResolveMethodGenerator

        public ResolveMethodGenerator(LighterTypes types,

                              ControllerGenerator controller,
                              Endpoint endpoint)
        Construct a new resolve method generator for a specific implementation
        Parameters:
        types - type utilities
        typeAdapterFactory - generator for the top-level TypeAdapterFactory.
        requestGuards - Map of request guard factory code generators keyed by the name of the RequestGuard type they produce
        controller - generator for the controller that contains the method this resolver will delegate to
        endpoint - the endpoint which represents this request resolver.
